Detailed Description

Class for automatically converting Makefile.am to SConscript.

The class can handle simple Makefile.am 100% correct, for complex ones, manual fine-tunning is required. These are something that can not handle:

  • Custom make target
  • extra moc files
  • checking programs (test/EXTRA, how to enable checking?? )
  • conditional compilation
  • install dir support
  • DATA files handling
